      • updateWorker

        public java.lang.Boolean updateWorker(Journalist jn)
                               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: HumanRecGateway
        Updates the information about a worker to the system. The journalist with the same ID is replaced by the new one, although it remains author of his pictures, etc.
        Specified by:
        updateWorker in interface HumanRecGateway
        Parameters:
        jn - The new version of the journalist
        Returns:
        Boolean True if and only if the journalist existed in the system before and could be replaced.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - If something goes wrong in the connection/serialization.

      • updateWorker

        public java.lang.Boolean updateWorker(Photographer pg)
                               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: HumanRecGateway
        Updates the information about a worker to the system. The photographer with the same ID is replaced by the new one, although it remains author of his pictures, etc.
        Specified by:
        updateWorker in interface HumanRecGateway
        Parameters:
        pg - The new version of the photographer
        Returns:
        Boolean True if and only if the photographer existed in the system before and could be replaced.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - If something goes wrong in the connection/serialization.
